original_title: The Trial of Jack The Ripper
overview: The Trial of Jack the RipperÂ (2002)  The Trial of Jack the Ripper, was a TV Special, shown on the Discovery Channel, in 2002, the programme focused on four well known Ripper suspects - Francis Tumblety, Sir William Gull, James Maybrick and Aaron Kosminski.
title: The Trial of Jack The Ripper
